<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/declaraciones"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

Permite el ingreso de una nueva declaración al sistema SIAD.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"numeroDeclaracion":{"type":"string"},"canalRiesgo":{"type":"string","enum":["NARANJA","ROJO"]},"tipoDiligenciaRequerida":{"type":"string","enum":["DOCUMENTAL","FISICA"]}},"required":["numeroDeclaracion","canalRiesgo","tipoDiligenciaRequerida"],"title":"DeclaracionInput"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
